TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProfileProviderCollection extends System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection
Public NotInheritable Class ProfileProviderCollection Inherits SettingsProviderCollection

summary.span: 繼承 抽象類別的物件之集合。

span.span: A collection of objects that inherit the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式的設定檔提供者會公開為唯讀透過屬性類別。The profile providers for an application are exposed as a read-only through the property of the class. 您可以依名稱存取集合中的特定設定檔提供者，並將其轉型為特定的提供者型別，例如。You can access a specific profile provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 這可讓您從單一應用程式中的多個資料存放區中管理使用者設定檔屬性。This enables you to manage user profile properties from multiple data stores in a single application. 它也可讓您存取不是成員的特定設定檔提供者成員抽象類別。It also allows you to access members of a specific profile provider that are not members of the abstract class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列出啟用應用程式和其各自的型別提供者。The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/CS/Providerscs.aspx#9)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/VB/Providersvb.aspx#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 建立新的空白設定檔提供者集合。

span.span: Creates a new, empty profile provider collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式不是從您的程式碼使用。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code. 應用程式的設定檔提供者會公開為唯讀透過屬性類別。The profile providers for an application are exposed as a read-only through the property of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Add(class System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase provider) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Add (provider As ProviderBase)

param.name: provider
param.span: 要加入至集合的設定檔提供者。

span.span: The profile provider to add to the collection.

summary.span: 將設定檔提供者加入至集合中。

span.span: Adds a profile provider to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法並不適合從程式碼使用。This method is not intended to be used from your code. 設定檔提供者執行個體加入至`ProfileProviderCollection`應用程式使用[設定檔 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的提供者項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f)區段的組態項目。Profile provider instances are added to the `ProfileProviderCollection` for an application using the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) section of the configuration element. 您可以存取設定檔提供者集合使用屬性類別。You can access the profile provider collection using the property of the class.

exception.span: 不是繼承 抽象類別的類型。

span.span: is not of a type that inherits the abstract class.

public: property System::Web::Profile::ProfileProvider ^ default[System::String ^] { System::Web::Profile::ProfileProvider ^ get(System::String ^ name); };

span.span: The name of the profile provider.

summary.span: 傳回指定的提供者名稱所參考的設定檔提供者。

span.span: Returns the profile provider referenced by the specified provider name.

value.span: 繼承 抽象類別的物件。

span.span: An object that inherits the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式的設定檔提供者會公開為唯讀透過屬性類別。The profile providers for an application are exposed as a read-only through the property of the class. 您可以依名稱存取集合中的特定設定檔提供者，並將其轉型為特定的提供者型別，例如。You can access a specific profile provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 這可讓您從單一應用程式中的多個資料存放區中管理使用者設定檔屬性。This enables you to manage user profile properties from multiple data stores in a single application. 它也可讓您存取不是成員的特定設定檔提供者成員抽象類別。It also allows you to access members of a specific profile provider that are not members of the abstract class.
